author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM...
summary: ...HENRIETTE HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 5:00 PM HST Sat Aug 09 the center of Henriette was located near 23.0, -149.1 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 5:00 PM HST Sat Aug 09 the center of Henriette was located near 23.0, -149.1 with movement NW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
